Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AppointmentController
public class AppointmentController extends Object
Controller class to manage appointments, doctor unavailability, and appointment outcomes. This class provides methods for scheduling, responding to, and completing appointments, as well as managing unavailability and outcomes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static List<Appointment>
    appointments
    List of appointment requests, initialized from the ApptRequest CSV.
    private static List<AppOutcome>
    appOutcomes
    List of appointment outcomes, initialized from the ApptOutcome CSV.
    private static final String
    APPTOUTCOME_CSV_FILE
    File path for the appointment outcome data.

    APPTREQ_CSV_FILE
    File path for the appointment request data.
    (package private) static CSVUtilsInterface
    csvUtils
    Interface for handling CSV operations such as reading and writing data.
    private static Map<String,String>
    doctorIdToNameMap
    Map to store doctor IDs and their corresponding names, initialized from the Staff_List CSV.
    private static Map<String,String>
    patientIdToNameMap
    Map to store patient IDs and their corresponding names, initialized from the Patient_List CSV.
    private static final String
    UNAVAIL_CSV_FILE
    File path for the unavailability data (doctor's unavailability schedule).
    private static List<Unavailability>
    unavailabilities
    List of unavailability records, initialized from the Unavailability CSV.

  • Method Details

    • updateDoctorUnavailability

      public static void updateDoctorUnavailability(String dateTime, String doctorID)
      Updates the doctor's unavailability for a specified date and time.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the date and time of unavailability in the format "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm"
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor whose unavailability is being updated

    • showDoctorUnavailability

      public static void showDoctorUnavailability(String doctorFilter, String dateFilter, boolean checkingAvail)
      Displays the doctor's unavailability based on filters for doctor and/or date. Optionally, shows available time slots for a specific date and doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorFilter - filter to match a specific doctor's name (case-insensitive)
      dateFilter - filter to match a specific date in the format "dd-MM-yyyy"
      checkingAvail - true if showing available slots; false if showing unavailable slots

    • showDoctorSchedule

      public static void showDoctorSchedule(String doctorID)
      Displays the schedule of unavailable time slots for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor whose schedule is being shown

    • showAppointmentRequests

      public static List<Appointment> showAppointmentRequests(String doctorID)
      Retrieves and displays appointment requests for a specified doctor. Only appointments with a status of PENDING are shown.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor for whom appointment requests are being retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of pending appointments for the doctor

    • respondToRequest

      public static void respondToRequest(String doctorID, String patientID, String dateTime, boolean accept)
      Responds to an appointment request by accepting or declining it.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor responding to the request
      patientID - the ID of the patient making the request
      dateTime - the requested date and time of the appointment in "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm"
      accept - true to accept the request, false to decline

    • completeAppointment

      public static void completeAppointment(String doctorID, String patientID, String dateTime)
      Marks an appointment as completed and records its outcome, including service type, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor completing the appointment
      patientID - the ID of the patient for whom the appointment is being completed
      dateTime - the date and time of the appointment in "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm"

    • readApptOutcome

      public static void readApptOutcome(String patientID)
      Reads and displays appointment outcomes for a specified patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose appointment outcomes are being retrieved

    • showUpcomingAppointment

      public static void showUpcomingAppointment(String doctorID)
      Displays upcoming appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor.

    • cancelAppointmentRequests

      public static void cancelAppointmentRequests(String doctorID, String dateTime)
      Cancels a confirmed appointment request for a specific doctor at a given time.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      dateTime - The time of the appointment to cancel.

    • isSlotAvailable

      public static boolean isSlotAvailable(String dateTime, String doctorID)
      Checks if a specific time slot is available for booking for a given doctor.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The desired appointment time.
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      Returns:
      True if the slot is available, false otherwise.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static void scheduleAppointment(String dateTime, String patientID, String doctorName)
      Schedules a new appointment for a patient with a specified doctor.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The desired appointment time.
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static void rescheduleAppointment(String patientID, String dateTime, String newDateTime)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new time.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      dateTime - The current appointment time.
      newDateTime - The new appointment time.

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(String patientID, String dateTime)
      Cancels an existing appointment for a patient at a specific time.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      dateTime - The time of the appointment to cancel.

    • showPatientAppointment

      public static void showPatientAppointment(String patientID)
      Displays all upcoming appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.

    • setPrescriptionStatus

      public static void setPrescriptionStatus(String patientID)
      Updates the prescription status of medications for a patient whose appointment is completed.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
